page.title: 16THE SANDAY FIRE BRIGADE
page.content: Mr.Muir is the{chief fireman}of Sanday. He chose to be a fireman because it is handy if your own farm catches fire. There hasn't been a bad fire on Sanday for a few years, but there are about 2{chimney fires}every year. When there is a{fire,}you{phone {999}and get the Fire Brigade in {Inverness.}They phone Mr. Muir who contacts his{Auxiliary Firemen,}who {collect the fire fighting equipment from the fire hut.There are{no {fire engines}on Sanday, so Mr. Robertson collects the{water pump}in his van. The water pump can be plugged into one of{20_30 fire hydrants}on Sanday. The other firemen use their {cars}as{fire engines.}They wear white {safety helmets, yellow plastic {jackets}and{trousers,}and{black rubber {boots.
